net.myorb.math.polynomial

Class PolynomialOptimizer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.polynomial.PolynomialOptimizer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of values from expressions

    public class PolynomialOptimizer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    embed coefficients into polynomial definitions to improve efficiency
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
